C

ClientConnection - Class in jexxus.client
Used to establish a connection to a server.
ClientConnection(ClientConnectionListener, String, int) - Constructor for class jexxus.client.ClientConnection
Creates a new connection to a server.
ClientConnection(ClientConnectionListener, String, int, int) - Constructor for class jexxus.client.ClientConnection
Creates a new connection to a server.
ClientConnectionListener - Interface in jexxus.client
A class which implements this interface is able to use a client connection.
clientDisconnected(ServerConnection, boolean) - Method in interface jexxus.server.ServerConnectionListener
Called whenever a client gets disconnected from the server.
connect() - Method in class jexxus.client.ClientConnection
Tries to open a connection to the server.
Connection - Interface in jexxus.common
Represents a connection between two computers.
connectionBroken(boolean) - Method in interface jexxus.client.ClientConnectionListener
Called when the connection is broken.
